claim_summary: Act 776 of 2025 §25 appropriates $300,000 from the Specialty Court Program Fund for costs associated with the Specialty Court Program and support for the Specialty Court Advisory Committee; §32 appropriates $4,500,000 from the State Central Services Fund for specialty courts and grants and aid【283384439218215†L631-L640】【283384439218215†L760-L776】.
